update_every.title: Update every
update_every.description: Data collection interval, measured in seconds.

address.title: URI
address.description: The URI specifying the connection details for the Pika server.

timeout.title: Timeout
timeout.description: Timeout for establishing a connection and communication (reading and writing) in seconds.

vnode.title: Vnode
vnode.description: Associates this data collection job with a [Virtual Node](https://learn.netdata.cloud/docs/netdata-agent/configuration/organize-systems-metrics-and-alerts#virtual-nodes).

tls_skip_verify.title: Skip TLS verification
tls_skip_verify.description: If set, TLS certificate verification will be skipped.

tls_ca.title: TLS CA
tls_ca.description: The path to the CA certificate file for TLS verification.

tls_cert.title: TLS certificate
tls_cert.description: The path to the client certificate file for TLS authentication.

tls_key.title: TLS key
tls_key.description: The path to the client key file for TLS authentication.

vnode.ui:placeholder: To use this option, first create a Virtual Node and then reference its name here.

timeout.ui:help: Accepts decimals for precise control (e.g., type 1.5 for 1.5 seconds).
